title: First Look: The Canyon Grizl:ON e-Gravel Bike is a Bit Extra, and that’s OK
content:
Canyon modestly describe the new Grizl:ON as a teleportation device, while simultaneously making its rider "more pilot, less passenger"

Read the full article at First Look: The Canyon Grizl:ON e-Gravel Bike is a Bit Extra, and that’s OK on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
